# Test Cases for the T-Selector
# if C is enabled then pick immediate
# if D is enabled then sign extend im15 + t31-t16
# if D is disabled then im15-im0 + t15-0
# { t[31:0], rd[4:0], sh[4:0], f[5:0], C, D }

testCase {
0000000000000000	0000000000000000
00000 00000 000001
1 0
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 }

testCase {
0000000000000000	0000000000000001
00000 00000 000001
1 0
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 }

testCase {
0000000000000000	0000000000000001
10000 00000 000001
1 1
1111 1111 1111 1111 1000 0000 0000 0001 }

testCase {
0001000000000000	0000000000000001
00000 00000 000001
1 0
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 }

testCase {
0000000000000001	0000000000000001
00000 00000 000001
1 0
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 }
